text: Balthali is a village development committee in Kavrepalanchok District in Bagmati Pradesh of central Nepal. At the time of the 1991 Nepal census it had a population of 2473 and had 496 houses in it. ==References== ==External links== *UN map of the municipalities of Kavrepalanchok District Category:Populated places in Kavrepalanchok District
title: Balthali
